name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Nerissa Ravencroft, Takanashi Kiara, and Fuwawa/Mococo perform 'LOVE Machine' in 3D.
Transition scene as Nerissa moves to her 3D studio setting.
Nerissa welcomes viewers to her studio and introduces her pet bird, Shadow.
Special guests Mori Calliope and Houshou Marine join Nerissa in the studio.
The trio prepares to practice a script for an upcoming performance.
Nerissa, Calliope, and Marine perform a script reading of 'A Brush with Death: A Pirate's Tale'.

subtitles.english: It's not that kind of thing though.

subtitles.english: Welcome to my studio.

subtitles.original: This is where I do all of my recording.
subtitles.english: This is where I do all of my recording.

subtitles.original: Of course you've heard of it, but this is your first time being here.
subtitles.english: Of course you've heard of it, but this is your first time being here.

subtitles.original: But more importantly, my little guy here...
subtitles.english: But more importantly, my little guy here...

subtitles.english: Here, here, yes

subtitles.original: My baby.
subtitles.english: My baby.

subtitles.original: My baby bird.
subtitles.english: My baby bird.

subtitles.original: Isn't he cute?
subtitles.english: Isn't he cute?

subtitles.english: I know you guys are always begging to see him, so there you go.

subtitles.original: And now that we're done cooking,
subtitles.english: And now that we're done cooking,

subtitles.english: I've gone ahead and put my jacket back on.

subtitles.english: Very nice, right?

subtitles.original: It really adds to the appeal.
subtitles.english: It really adds to the appeal.

subtitles.original: But today is not only all about me,
subtitles.english: But today is not only all about me,

subtitles.original: I have some wonderful special guests
subtitles.english: I have some wonderful special guests

subtitles.original: if you'd like to come on out and introduce yourselves.

subtitles.original: I'm so happy to have these two wonderful ladies here with me today.
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to have these two wonderful ladies here with me today.

subtitles.original: Thanks for inviting us.
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting us.

subtitles.english: Congratulations! Congrats!

subtitles.english: Thank you very much. 3D, thank you.

subtitles.original: Looks so good. You look lovely.
subtitles.english: Looks so good. You look lovely.

subtitles.original: Yeah?
subtitles.english: Yeah?

subtitles.original: Well, I'm so excited because we have a song we're going to be performing for all of you.
subtitles.english: Well, I'm so excited because we have a song we're going to be performing for all of you.

subtitles.original: I know, a trio between Calliope, Marine, and Nerissa. Who would have thunk it?
subtitles.english: I know, a trio between Calliope, Marine, and Nerissa. Who would have thunk it?

subtitles.original: But the team is not quite ready yet.
subtitles.english: But the team is not quite ready yet.

subtitles.english: So first I thought we could practice...

subtitles.english: practice a script that we are performing.

subtitles.original: Because you know, we are professional actors. はい。
subtitles.english: Because you know, we are professional actors. Yes.

subtitles.original: Yeah, this thing.
subtitles.english: Yeah, this thing.

subtitles.original: This thing, that script.
subtitles.english: This thing, that script.

subtitles.original: That script for that thing.
subtitles.english: That script for that thing.

subtitles.english: Yeah, do you remember what our show is called?

subtitles.original: I sure do,
subtitles.english: I sure do,

subtitles.original: but can you go ahead and I guess recite it for the audience who doesn't know.
subtitles.english: but can you go ahead and I guess recite it for the audience who doesn't know.

subtitles.original: It is going to be... um... good question,
subtitles.english: It is going to be... um... good question,

subtitles.english: I think, "A Brush with Death: A Pirate's Tale".

subtitles.english: let's go everyone. Let's go, let's go.

subtitles.english: Okay, okay. Start!

subtitles.original: My Goddess of Love! I have the treasure!
subtitles.english: My Goddess of Love! I have the treasure!

subtitles.original: 愛の女神様！お宝を持ってきました！
subtitles.english: My Goddess of Love! I have the treasure!

subtitles.original: I... I... finished! My present, please!
subtitles.english: I... I... finished! My present, please!

subtitles.original: 私……やりました！ごほうび……ください。
subtitles.english: I... I... finished! My present, please!

subtitles.original: A wonderful job finding my lost wares, Captain.
subtitles.english: A wonderful job finding my lost wares, Captain.

subtitles.original: 私が失いしものをよくぞ見つけました。
subtitles.english: A wonderful job finding my lost wares.

subtitles.original: But you must realize this was not the treasure I spoke of.
subtitles.english: But you must realize this was not the treasure I spoke of.

subtitles.original: しかしそれは私の言った『宝物』ではありません。
subtitles.english: But you must realize this was not the treasure I spoke of.

subtitles.original: What!?
subtitles.english: What!?

subtitles.original: え！
subtitles.english: What!?

subtitles.original: Of course not! It never was.
subtitles.english: Of course not! It never was.

subtitles.original: It was always about what you had, not what I lost.
subtitles.english: It was always about what you had, not what I lost.

subtitles.original: 全ッ然違います！私ではなく、あなたが持っていたものとの方なのです！
subtitles.english: Of course not! It was always about what you had, not what I lost!

subtitles.original: All of these things were stolen from my
subtitles.english: All of these things were stolen from my

subtitles.original: idiot siblings thousands of years ago.
subtitles.english: idiot siblings thousands of years ago.

subtitles.original: この宝は全て、何千年も前に私の姉妹が盗まれたもの！
subtitles.english: All of these were stolen from my siblings thousands of years ago!

subtitles.original: I planted these here for safe keeping, and they were safe,
subtitles.english: I planted these here for safe keeping, and they were safe,

subtitles.original: at least until the waves took this place.
subtitles.english: at least until the waves took this place.

subtitles.original: 宝はここに埋めて隠していたのですが、ある日大波が全部さらっていってしまった……。
subtitles.english: I planted these here for safe keeping, until the waves took them...

subtitles.original: You lost the whole island!?
subtitles.english: You lost the whole island!?

subtitles.original: 島ごと全部失くしたってこと？
subtitles.english: You lost the whole island!?

subtitles.original: What!? No!
subtitles.english: What!? No!

subtitles.original: ち、違います！
subtitles.english: W-What!? No!

subtitles.original: What I am saying is I knew where it was the whole time! I...
subtitles.english: What I am saying is I knew where it was the whole time! I...

subtitles.original: 宝のありかははずっと分かっていました！ただ……
subtitles.english: I knew where it was the whole time! However...

subtitles.original: But... what did she see in you?
subtitles.english: But... what did she see in you?

subtitles.original: こんなやつがよかったんだ？
subtitles.english: Did you really like this fellow?

subtitles.original: A beautiful young woman like her, with an old hag like you.
subtitles.english: A beautiful young woman like her, with an old hag like you.

subtitles.original: あんあ素敵な女性が、こんなババアと……。
subtitles.english: A lovely woman like her, with an old hag like you...

subtitles.original: Old hag!?
subtitles.english: Old hag!?

subtitles.original: ババア！？
subtitles.english: Old hag!?

subtitles.original: I am young, beautiful!
subtitles.english: I am young, beautiful!

subtitles.original: 若くて美人でしょうが！
subtitles.english: I'm young and beautiful!

subtitles.original: Yeah, and I'm the Goddess of Death.
subtitles.english: Yeah, and I'm the Goddess of Death.

subtitles.original: じゃあ私は死神でも名乗ろうかしら。
subtitles.english: Well then, maybe I'll call myself the Reaper.

subtitles.original: Look at you, you're creeping slowly towards your grave.
subtitles.english: Look at you, you're creeping slowly towards your grave.

subtitles.original: 「自称」より言ったもの勝ちですものね？
subtitles.english: It's better to say it than to just 'self-proclaim', right?
